specials.name: Pierce Armor
specials.description: The devilfish makes a fangs Strike against a creature it is grabbing. If the attack hits, the creature is knocked prone; if the creature is wearing armor with hardness 10 or lower, the armor is broken. If this Strike breaks a creature's armor or damages a creature who is unarmored or wearing broken armor, the creature also takes 2d6 persistent bleed damage. This Strike doesn't further damage armor that's already broken.

specials.name: Pounce
specials.description: The devilfish Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the devilfish begins this action hidden, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

specials.name: Sneak Attack
specials.description: The devilfish deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.
